alert.note: Alert for Northwest Blue Mountains (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pendleton (Northeast Oregon and Southeast Washington)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 29 at 9:44AM PST until December 31 at 4:00AM PST by NWS Pendleton
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 7 AM THURSDAY TO 4 AM PST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 10 to 14 inches. * WHERE...In Washington, Northwest Blue Mountains. In Oregon, Northern Blue Mountains of Oregon. * WHEN...From 7 AM Thursday to 4 AM PST Friday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1, or by visiting online at https://tripcheck.com for Oregon or https://wsdot.com/travel for Washington.
